statements: SELECT user_id, permission_level, access_control FROM user_permissions;
SELECT * FROM user_permissions ORDER BY permission_level DESC;
SELECT user_id, access_control FROM user_permissions WHERE permission_level > 1;
SELECT user_id, permission_level FROM user_permissions WHERE access_control = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, access_control, permission_level FROM user_permissions ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_permissions WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT user_id, permission_level FROM user_permissions WHERE permission_level > 2 ORDER BY permission_level DESC
SELECT user_id, access_control FROM user_permissions WHERE access_control LIKE '%read%' ORDER BY user_id ASC
SELECT user_id, permission_level, access_control FROM user_permissions WHERE permission_level <= 3 AND access_control IN ('full', 'limited')
SELECT user_id, access_control FROM user_permissions WHERE permission_level = 1 AND access_control IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username FROM users WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM permissions WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT user_id, permission_type FROM permissions WHERE permission_id = 4;
SELECT username, password FROM users WHERE username = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE password = 'password';
SELECT * FROM permissions ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, permission_type FROM permissions WHERE permission_type = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT role_name FROM roles ORDER BY role_id DESC;
SELECT username, password_hash FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM permissions WHERE permission_name = 'read';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username FROM users WHERE password_hash = 'some_password';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT role_name FROM roles INNER JOIN users ON roles.role_id = users.user_id;
SELECT user_id, role_id, permission_name FROM users JOIN roles ON users.user_id = roles.role_id JOIN permissions ON roles.role_id = permissions.permission_id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id > 5;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM roles ORDER BY role_name DESC;
SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM roles WHERE role_name = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, username, email, role_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id;
SELECT * FROM permissions WHERE permission_name LIKE '%read%';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_accounts;
SELECT user_id, user_name FROM user_accounts WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM user_role_mapping JOIN user_roles ON user_role_mapping.role_id = user_roles.role_id;
SELECT user_name, email FROM user_accounts WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT session_id, login_time FROM user_session ORDER BY login_time DESC;
SELECT user_id, user_name FROM user_accounts WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_name, email FROM user_accounts WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT user_id, user_name, email FROM user_accounts WHERE user_id > 100 AND email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM user_roles JOIN user_role_mapping ON user_roles.role_id = user_role_mapping.role_id;

SELECT user_accounts.user_id, user_accounts.user_name, user_roles.role_name FROM user_accounts JOIN user_role_mapping ON user_accounts.user_id = user_role_mapping.user_id JOIN user_roles ON user_role_mapping.role_id = user_roles.role_id;
